channel.title: Magdump
channel.description: If you've got a weapon (it's happened on the MP5 so far) equipped and use the suit zoom for a closer look at what you've been firing at, when you zoom out the weapon will suddenly start firing and not stop until the current magazine is empty. When you reload everything will be normal, but it costs a lot of ammunition.

item.title: Magdump
item.dc:creator: Piro21
item.description:
If you’ve got a weapon (it’s happened on the MP5 so far) equipped and use the suit zoom for a closer look at what you’ve been firing at, when you zoom out the weapon will suddenly start firing and not stop until the current magazine is empty. When you reload everything will be normal, but it costs a lot of ammunition.

Read full topic
